testcase.classname: End to End test cases for Amazon application
testcase.name: User login the applciation and verify user name in the header
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the applciation...........................................passed And User wait for '3' seconds...............................................passed When User moushover to the Hello sign in....................................passed And User wait for '3' seconds...............................................passed And User click on sign in button on ajax call...............................passed And User enter the username '8122447745' in the emailid/mobile number.......passed And User click on continue button...........................................passed Then User verify the entered mobile number '+918122447745' displays on the mobile number feild.passed When User enter the password '8148181640' in the password feild.............passed And User click on login button..............................................passed And User wait for '5' seconds...............................................passed Then User verify the username 'Hello, harish' in the header page............passed
